<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Bulk delete manufacturers"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/manufacturers/bulk/delete"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Deletes multiple manufacturers in a single bulk operation. Can specify individual manufacturer IDs or use `IsSelectAll` with filter criteria to delete all matching manufacturers.

**Request Options**
- `ManufacturerIds` - Array of specific manufacturer UUIDs to delete
- `IsSelectAll: true` - Delete all manufacturers matching filter criteria (use with caution)

**Workflow Example**
1. List manufacturers: [GET /api/v1.0/assets/manufacturers](/docs/api/manufacturers/get-manufacturers) â†’ identify targets.
2. Build request with `ManufacturerIds` array.
3. Call this endpoint: [POST /api/v1.0/manufacturers/bulk/delete](/docs/api/manufacturers/bulk-delete-manufacturers).

**Constraints**: Manufacturers with existing asset models cannot be deleted. Delete or reassign models first.

**Related Endpoints:**
- [DELETE /api/v1.0/assets/manufacturers/\{ManufacturerId\}](/docs/api/manufacturers/delete-manufacturer) - Delete single manufacturer

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>

  parameters={undefined}

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"description":"Bulk delete request specifying which manufacturers to delete","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Request payload for bulk deleting manufacturers","properties":{"ManufacturerIds":{"type":"array","description":"List of manufacturer IDs to delete","items":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}},"Request":{"type":"object","description":"Additional request parameters","properties":{"ManufacturerId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Single manufacturer ID (used internally)"}}},"IsSelectAll":{"type":"boolean","description":"When true, deletes all manufacturers matching the filter criteria instead of using ManufacturerIds","default":false},"ManufacturersRequest":{"type":"object","description":"Filter criteria when IsSelectAll is true","properties":{"FilterByProduct":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether to filter by product","default":true},"ProductId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Product ID to filter by"}}}},"title":"BulkDeleteManufacturersRequest"},"example":{"ManufacturerIds":["a1b2c3d4-e5f6-7890-abcd-ef1234567890","b2c3d4e5-f6a7-8901-bcde-f12345678901"],"IsSelectAll":false}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
